'Frank Charles Shorter' (born October 31, 1947) is an American former long-
distance runner who won the gold medal in the marathon at the 1972 Summer
Olympics. His victory is credited with igniting the running boom in the United
States of the 1970s. http://republicanherald.com/sports/u-s-in-another-running-boom-
1.469153 Republican Herald http://newsblogs.chicagotribune.com/sports-
_globetrotting/2008/10/marathon-men-th.html Chicago Tribune October 10, 2008 by
Phil Hersh
